main.name: Mouyleng Heng
main.habit: Learn new language, Play Kalimbah, Plants
main.bio: Hi, I‚Äôm Mouyleng. I am a Software Engineering student in Kirirom Institute of Technology - KIT. I am a UX/UI designing and Frontend Web Development intern in my university. Coding is suck sometimes. So I have somethings else to occupy myself like design or doing somethings creative . Always accept new challenges. Willing to learn new things. Believe in Hard-work and Teamwork. Every success is not coincidental but it comes from working hard, commitment, learning and sacrifice. Hard-work pays off.
main.briefbio: Hi, I'm Mouyleng from Pursat Province, Cambodia üá∞üá≠ ! I am currently in my senior year majoring in Software Engineering in Kirirom Institute of Technology - KIT. I like creative things üí´  like DIY, design, handmade thing, origami and so on. Recently just found a new hobby which is Dancing. It's fun.

quote.text: However tiresome it becomes never let yourself succum to despair.

main.address: No. 245, Pheal Nhek I village, Phteah Prey Commune, Pursat Municipality, Pursat Province

work.description: was assigned into various projects with different experiences, team and skillsets.

projects.title: Casstack Chatbot Ordering System Q4 2021
projects.description: UX/UI Design, and Develop Dashboard for Chatbot ordering

projects.title: KIT Point Management System 5.0
projects.description: One year experience with Vue.js as well as Nuxtjs, and Vueitfy. Developing an internal system with full of functionalities logics and dashboards with supporting of existing components and library. Fetch data from RestAPI in database to display in UI.

projects.title: Data Science Research
projects.description: Have done a small research in Data Science and explore in R programming. Took online course. Throughout the course I‚Äôve learnt how to visualize, use and analyze data. How dataframe were programmed in R and show as a plot diagram which is easy to predict and analyze.

projects.title: Solar and Earthship Research
projects.description: Research about solar panel. Find the solution for Earthship off-grid Accommodation in the deep forest in Kirirom, How to prevent and look after the solar from wild animal and the weather.

projects.title: VKIS - Tech Teaching
projects.description: Support VKIS aka VKirirom International School in guiding and introducing new Technologies and Programming for the kids from foreign countries such as Philippines, Japan, Cambodia, etc. From the research I have learnt the new technology and improve my soft skills like how to convey and persuade the kids of the knowledge I‚Äôve known.

projects.title: KIT Student Recruitement 2019
projects.description: 6 months experience with Digital Marketing, Creating content and script of videos. Focus on 3 main contents which is Transforming Lives, Addressing Cocerns and Student Life & Academic Highlight. In charge of promoting school via Facebook for recruiting the best students in Cambodia.

design.title: Promofy
design.description: Prototyping a mobile application called ‚ÄúPromofy‚Äù for a side project and also a training course to launch a start-up idea. Design icon, logo of the app .

design.title: Loffee
design.description: Made a mockup prototype and demo for mobile application called Loffee to join Technovation Cambodia Competition. Loffee is a mobile application for finding the best place to eat and drink based on the nearest location, best Local Favorite, and real-time on a map location with promotion. Furthermore, you can do all of these along with your friend and family.

achievements.title: Lances Design Competition | July 2020
achievements.details: Designed a logo with the specific requirement of the client and was selected as the winner among other participants and won a cash prize of that competition. The logo still being using in the company in Japan.

achievements.title: Awards of Internship Performance
achievements.details: Was selected as outstanding performance in Internship which is ‚ÄúHardworking sincere with Positive Attitude‚Äù
